transformations.name: SelectCategoryColumns
transformations.description: Renaming DimCategory to select1 with EnglishProductCategoryName, SpanishProductCategoryName, FrenchProductCategoryName'

content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_customer') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_customer;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_customer(    
    [CustomerKey] [int],
	[GeographyKey] [int],
	[CustomerAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[Title] [nvarchar](8),
	[FirstName] [nvarchar](50),
	[MiddleName] [nvarchar](50),
	[LastName] [nvarchar](50),
	[NameStyle] [bit],
	[BirthDate] [date],
	[MaritalStatus] [nchar](1),
	[Suffix] [nvarchar](10),
	[Gender] [nvarchar](1),
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50),
	[YearlyIncome] [money],
	[TotalChildren] [tinyint],
	[NumberChildrenAtHome] [tinyint],
	[EnglishEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[SpanishEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[FrenchEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[EnglishOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[SpanishOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[FrenchOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[HouseOwnerFlag] [nchar](1),
	[NumberCarsOwned] [tinyint],
	[AddressLine1] [nvarchar](120),
	[AddressLine2] [nvarchar](120),
	[Phone] [nvarchar](20),
	[DateFirstPurchase] [date],
	[CommuteDistance] [nvarchar](15) )
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimCustomer.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_customer'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_date') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date(    
	[DateKey] [int],
	[FullDateAlternateKey] [date],
	[DayNumberOfWeek] [tinyint] ,
	[EnglishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),     
	[DayNumberOfMonth] [tinyint],
	[DayNumberOfYear] [smallint],
	[WeekNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[EnglishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[MonthNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[CalendarQuarter] [tinyint],
	[CalendarYear] [smallint],
	[CalendarSemester] [tinyint],
	[FiscalQuarter] [tinyint],
	[FiscalYear] [smallint],
	[FiscalSemester] [tinyint])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimDate.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_date'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_date;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_employee') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee(    
    [EmployeeKey] [int],
	[ParentEmployeeKey] [int],
	[EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[FirstName] [nvarchar](50),
	[LastName] [nvarchar](50),
	[MiddleName] [nvarchar](50),
	[NameStyle] [bit],
	[Title] [nvarchar](50),
	[HireDate] [date],
	[BirthDate] [date],
	[LoginID] [nvarchar](256),
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50),
	[Phone] [nvarchar](25),
	[MaritalStatus] [nchar](1),
	[EmergencyContactName] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmergencyContactPhone] [nvarchar](25),
	[SalariedFlag] [bit],
	[Gender] [nchar](1),
	[PayFrequency] [tinyint],
	[BaseRate] [money],
	[VacationHours] [smallint],
	[SickLeaveHours] [smallint],
	[CurrentFlag] [bit],
	[SalesPersonFlag] [bit],
	[DepartmentName] [nvarchar](50),
	[StartDate] [date],
	[EndDate] [date],
	[Status] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmployeePhoto] [varbinary](max))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimEmployee.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_employee'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_geography') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_geography;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_geography(    
	[GeographyKey] [int],
	[City] [nvarchar](30),

	[StateProvinceName] [nvarchar](50),
	[CountryRegionCode] [nvarchar](3),
	[EnglishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[PostalCode] [nvarchar](15),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[IpAddressLocator] [nvarchar](15))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimGeography.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_geography'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_geography;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product_category') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_category;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_category(    
	[ProductCategoryKey] [int],
	[ProductCategoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[EnglishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProductCategory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product_category'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product_category;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product_subcategory') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_subcategory;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_subcategory(    
	[ProductSubcategoryKey] [int],
	[ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[EnglishProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[ProductCategoryKey] [int])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProductSubcategory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product_subcategory'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product_subcategory;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int] 1,               
	[ProductAlternateKey] [nvarchar](25) 2,
	[ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] 3,           
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 4,
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 5,
	[EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 6,     
	[SpanishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 7,
	[FrenchProductName] [nvarchar](50) 8,
	[StandardCost] [money] 9,        
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] [bit] 10,
	[Color] [nvarchar](15) 11,         
	[SafetyStockLevel] [smallint] 12,
	[ReorderPoint] [smallint] 13,
	[ListPrice] [money] 14,
	[Size] [nvarchar](50) 15,
	[SizeRange] [nvarchar](50) 16,
	[Weight] [float] 17,
	[DaysToManufacture] [int] 18,
	[ProductLine] [nchar](2) 19,
	[DealerPrice] [money] 20,
	[Class] [nchar](2) 21,
	[Style] [nchar](2) 22,
	[ModelName] [nvarchar](50) 23,         
	[LargePhoto] [varbinary](max) NULL 24,
	[EnglishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 25,
	[FrenchDescription] [nvarchar](400) 26,
	[ChineseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 27,
	[ArabicDescription] [nvarchar](400) 28,
	[HebrewDescription] [nvarchar](400) 29,
	[ThaiDescription] [nvarchar](400) 30,
	[GermanDescription] [nvarchar](400) 31,
	[JapaneseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 32,
	[TurkishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 33,
	[StartDate] [datetime] 34,
	[EndDate] [datetime] 35,
	[Status] [nvarchar](7) 36))  
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProduct.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_sales_territory') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory(    
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryRegion] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryCountry] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryGroup] [nvarchar](50))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimSalesTerritory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_sales_territory'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_sales_territory;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.fact_internet_sales') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fact_internet_sales;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fact_internet_sales(    
	[ProductKey] [int],
	[OrderDateKey] [int],
	[DueDateKey] [int],
	[ShipDateKey] [int],
	[CustomerKey] [int],
	[PromotionKey] [int],
	[CurrencyKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[SalesOrderNumber] [nvarchar](20),
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] [tinyint],
	[RevisionNumber] [tinyint],
	[OrderQuantity] [smallint],
	[UnitPrice] [money],
	[ExtendedAmount] [money],
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] [float],
	[DiscountAmount] [float],
	[ProductStandardCost] [money],
	[TotalProductCost] [money],
	[SalesAmount] [money],
	[TaxAmt] [money],
	[Freight] [money],
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] [nvarchar](25),
	[CustomerPONumber] [nvarchar](25),
	[OrderDate] [datetime],
	[DueDate] [datetime],
	[ShipDate] [datetime])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'fact_files/FactInternetSales.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/fact_internet_sales'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.fact_internet_sales;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_customer
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.customer') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.customer;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.customer
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/customer',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  g.[Country Name], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryRegion] as [Region], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryGroup] as [Group],
  YEAR(CAST(s.[OrderDate] AS date)) AS [Order Year], 
  SUM(s.[OrderQuantity]) as [Total Order], 
  SUM(s.[SalesAmount]) as [Total Revenue]
FROM 
  silver.fact_internet_sales s
JOIN  silver.dim_customer c ON c.[CustomerKey] = s.[CustomerKey]
JOIN  silver.dim_geography g ON g.[GeographyKey] = c.[GeographyKey]
GROUP BY g.[Country Name], g.[SalesTerritoryRegion], g.[SalesTerritoryGroup],YEAR(CAST(s.[OrderDate] AS date));

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_customer;
SELECT * FROM gold.customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_employee
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.employee') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.employee;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.employee
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/employee',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  e.[EmployeeKey], 
  e.[SalesTerritoryKey], 
  e.[Title], 
  e.[MaritalStatus], 
  e.[Gender], 
  e.[DepartmentName],
  g.[Country Name], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryRegion] as [Region], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryGroup] as [Group] 
FROM 
  silver.dim_employee e
LEFT JOIN  silver.dim_geography g ON g.[SalesTerritoryKey] = e.[SalesTerritoryKey];

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_employee;
SELECT * FROM gold.employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_product
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT 
    s.[ProductKey],
    SUM(s.[OrderQuantity]) as [Total Orders],
    p.[EnglishProductName] as [ProductName],
    p.[EnglishProductCategoryName] as [CategoryName],
    p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName] as [SubcategoryName]
FROM silver.fact_internet_sales s
LEFT JOIN silver.dim_product p
ON s.[ProductKey] = p.[ProductKey]
GROUP BY s.[ProductKey],p.[EnglishProductName],p.[EnglishProductCategoryName],p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName];

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_product;
SELECT * FROM gold.product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_sales
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.sales') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.sales;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.sales
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/sales',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  SUM(SalesAmount) as [Total Revenue],
  SUM(ProductStandardCost) as [Total Cost],
  SUM(SalesAmount)-SUM(ProductStandardCost) as [Profit],
  SUM(SalesAmount)-SUM(ProductStandardCost)/SUM(SalesAmount) as [Profit Margin %],
  COUNT(DISTINCT(CustomerKey)) as [Total Customers],
  count(*) as [Total Transaction]
FROM 
  bronze.fact_internet_sales;

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_sales;
SELECT * FROM gold.sales;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_customer
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_customer') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_customer;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_customer
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_customer',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [CustomerKey], 
  [GeographyKey], 
  CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) as [Customer Name], 
  [BirthDate], 
  CASE WHEN MaritalStatus = 'M' THEN 'Married' WHEN MaritalStatus = 'S' THEN 'Single' END as MaritalStatus, 
  CASE WHEN Gender = 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN Gender = 'F' THEN 'Female' END AS Gender 
FROM bronze.dim_customer;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_customer;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_date
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_date') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_date;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_date
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_date',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [DateKey], 
  [FullDateAlternateKey], 
  [EnglishDayNameOfWeek], 
  [EnglishMonthName], 
  [CalendarYear], 
  [MonthNumberOfYear] 
FROM bronze.dim_date;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_date;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_date;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_employee
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_employee') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_employee;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_employee
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_employee',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [EmployeeKey], 
  [SalesTerritoryKey], 
  CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) as [Employee Name], 
  [Title], 
  CASE WHEN MaritalStatus = 'M' THEN 'Married' WHEN MaritalStatus = 'S' THEN 'Single' END as MaritalStatus, 
  CASE WHEN Gender = 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN Gender = 'F' THEN 'Female' END AS Gender, 
  [DepartmentName] 
FROM bronze.dim_employee;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_employee;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_geography
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_geography') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_geography',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [GeographyKey], 
  [City], 
  [EnglishCountryRegionName] AS [Country Name], 
  [SalesTerritoryRegion], 
  [SalesTerritoryGroup], 
  [PostalCode], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryKey] 
FROM 
  bronze.dim_geography g 
  JOIN bronze.dim_sales_territory t ON g.SalesTerritoryKey = t.SalesTerritoryKey;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_geography;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_geography;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_product
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int],
  [ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] , 
  [EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [Color] [nvarchar](15),
  [ModelName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [Status] [nvarchar](400), 
  [StandardCost] [nvarchar](10),
  [ProductCategoryKey] [nvarchar](10), 
  [EnglishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [EnglishProductSubcategoryName] [varchar](50))
WITH ( 
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_product;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.fact_internet_sales') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/fact_internet_sales',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [ProductKey], 
  [OrderDateKey], 
  [CustomerKey], 
  [SalesTerritoryKey], 
  [SalesOrderNumber], 
  [SalesOrderLineNumber], 
  [OrderQuantity], 
  [ProductStandardCost], 
  [SalesAmount], 
  CAST([OrderDate] AS date) AS OrderDate
FROM 
  bronze.fact_internet_sales;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales;
SELECT * FROM silver.fact_internet_sales;

CREATE DATABASE sales_db;
--DROP DATABASE sales_db;

USE sales_db;
ALTER DATABASE sales_db COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data_dimension
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data_dimension
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://data@ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/dim_files'
)

--DimDate.csv
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimDate.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data_dimension',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        DateKey INT 1,
        FullDateAlternateKey DATE 2, 
        EnglishDayNameOfWeek VARCHAR(10) 4, 
        EnglishMonthName VARCHAR(10) 10, 
        CalendarYear SMALLINT 15, 
        MonthNumberOfYear TINYINT 13

    )
    AS [result];


--DimCustomer.csv
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimCustomer.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data_dimension',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        CustomerKey INT 1,
        GeographyKey INT 2,
        firstname VARCHAR(50) 5,
        lastname VARCHAR(50) 7,
        BirthDate DATE 9,
        MaritalStatus CHAR(1) 10,
        Gender CHAR(1) 12
    )
    AS [result];

CREATE DATABASE sales_ldw;
GO

USE sales_ldw;
GO

ALTER DATABASE sales_ldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA bronze
GO

CREATE SCHEMA silver
GO

CREATE SCHEMA gold
GO

USE sales_ldw;
GO

--PSV with parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='psv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT psv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|'  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );

--CSV with parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );

--parquet with SnappyCodec compression
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='parquet_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format  
  WITH (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,  
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'  
       );
       
SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats

source:
## Sales Data Aggregation 
### Group By Columns
1. year
2. Month
3. Pickup Location ID
4. Drop Off Location ID

### Aggregated Columns
1. Total Trip Count
2. Total Fare Amount

### Purpose of the notebook
1. Create the aggregated table in Spark Pool
2. Access the data from Serverless SQL Pool

#Set the folder paths so that it can be used later. 
bronze_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
silver_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'
gold_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/gold'
#Set the spark config to be able to get the partitioned columns year and month as strings rather than integers

%%sql

-- Create database to which we are going to write the data

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyc_taxi_ldw_spark
LOCATION 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/gold';
# Read the silver data to be processed.

# Perform the required aggregations
# 1. Total trip count
# 2. Total fare amount
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

trip_data_green_agg_df = trip_data_green_df \
                        .groupBy("year", "month", "pu_location_id", "do_location_id") \
                        .agg(count(lit(1)).alias("total_trip_count"),
                        round(sum("fare_amount"), 2).alias("total_fare_amount"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption

trip_data_green_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year", "month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg")
